database.title: Unable to Start App
database.generic: We encountered an issue starting the app. Please try restarting.
database.orphaned: Your encryption key was lost, but your encrypted database still exists. Your previous data cannot be recovered and must be reset to continue using the app.

resetData.title: Reset All Local Data
resetData.message:
This will permanently delete all your health data, period tracking history, and settings. This action cannot be undone.

Are you sure you want to continue?

failed.title: Reset Failed
failed.message: Unable to reset local data. Please try again or reinstall the app.
